<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"> <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <access>package_private</access> <active>true</active> <api_name>sn_entitlement.DBUtil</api_name> <caller_access/> <client_callable>false</client_callable> <description/> <name>DBUtil</name> <script><![CDATA[var DBUtil = Class.create(); DBUtil.prototype = { initialize: function() {},
/** * Converts the output of a "Glide List" (comma separated values) into an array * * @param {string} val The value extracted from the Glide List * @returns {array} The resulting array derived from the glide list value */ convertGlideListToArray(val) { if (!val || val.trim().length === 0) return []; return val.split(','); },
type: 'DBUtil' };]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2023-01-19 20:39:52</sys_created_on> <sys_id>2038f8bcff602110468365d7d3b8fe8f</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>DBUtil</sys_name> <sys_package display_value="Licensing Engine" source="sn_entitlement">bcadabf277f311109c62f5f3cb5a992a</sys_package> <sys_policy>read</sys_policy> <sys_scope display_value="Licensing Engine">bcadabf277f311109c62f5f3cb5a992a</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_2038f8bcff602110468365d7d3b8fe8f</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2023-01-19 20:45:10</sys_updated_on> </sys_script_include> </record_update>
